subject: Replacement part for throttle
description_text: Hello.      I moved the blue stopper on the throttle to be closer to the pedal, when I accelerated apparently the black tabs that holds the spring that makes force to the load cell, broke.      I need a replacement for both.

conversations.body_text:
Hello.

I logged in and see there's no ticket for me.

I was able to dig more and find that something broke on my throttle.

I moved the blue stopped to be closer to the pedal, and apparently this black tab that holds the throttle spring, broke when I pressed the throttle and I need a replacement for this tabs. They are two and both of them broke.




Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Josue Rosa,  Please provide your order number and the model of your pedals, along with the contact person's name, phone number, and address. We will arrange to send you the improved replacement parts tomorrow, Monday.

Hello.

I bought these pedals on Amazon, brand new.

Simsonn Pro X Ultra.

Josue Rosa
2500 University Ave, Apt 3K
Bronx, NY, 10468


Order placed
Order #
August 1, 2025
113-2727781-6709856


Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

ID 为 3529 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单3529  
      主题: Question about part  
      描述:  
Hello.  
 
 
 
 
I recently purchased the pro x ultra pedals. I was adjusting the stopper in the throttle and after I moved the stopper and pressed the throttle, this part fell down. Now I have an issue with the throttle where it only detects input after ~25% of the pedal is
 pressed.  
 
 
 
 
Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device 
Get Outlook for Android
Hi Josue Rosa,  We will send you the new parts via express delivery tomorrow. Once they are shipped, we will promptly update you with the tracking number.

Hello.

Can you please provide me the tracking number for the part you were supposed to ship on Monday?

Thank you.

Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Josue Rosa,    I’ll check and get back to you with the tracking number shortly. My apologies for forgetting to reply earlier.

Hello?

Can I please have the tracking number?

Sent from my T-Mobile 5G Device
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Hi Josue Rosa,  Here is the tracking number: SF6045919782060. the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
